message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this dollar and call it a day.
You're being too stingy, let's split it down the middle!
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm still hoping for the majority.  Let's be reasonable.
You're not budging, I'm not budging either. Meet me in the middle!
I'm getting tired of this game, Bob. Let's end it here. Take 200000 and call it a day.
You're not willing to give me a fair share, I'll take what I can get. This is my last offer!
